Text.Page:
Up in the Hall of Maidens are the very worst of the horrors in this hellhole. I'm talking about those creepy dolls.

The {@LinkCreature:33#1#ghost} and {@LinkCreature:33#2#cursed moppets} might seem harmless—or even cute!—the first time you spot one, but when they swarm on your comrade and skin him alive...well that's a lot less cute. That might just haunt you for the rest of your days.

Are you brave enough to kill a few?

You look like you were successful!

Brave ! The—OH SWEET KAIA, THERE'S ONE ON YOUR BACK!

Wait. No. Just a shadow. My mistake.
